name: LED Vanity Mirror
description: Apply your makeup and skincare in the best light with this rechargeable, smart-touch LED vanity mirror designed with a tri-color light system.

name: Boost LED Mask
description: Plump, brighten, lift, treat uneven skin tone and texture, reduce fine lines and wrinkles, and heal inflammation for a hydrated, even complexion.

name: The Canopy Humidifier Starter Set
description: A completely reimagined humidifier that promotes healthy, dewy skin while combating redness, dryness, fine lines and wrinkles.

name: Energia Luminosa Obsidian Gua Sha
description: Natural volcanic obsidian sculpted into the ideal shape for massaging décolleté, neck, and face.

name: Halo Hair Dryer
description: Uses light and cooler air to dry your hair, natural and comfortable, while maintaining fast drying speed.

name: Whirl Trio
description: Effortlessly create relaxed tousled waves, uniform spiral waves, or soft loose wavesand everything in between.

name: LUNA 3  Normal Skin
description: Meet LUNA 3, the softest skincare device in the beauty world. Featuring 30% softer silicone touchpoints and T-Sonic technology, LUNA 3 lifts away dirt, oil, and excess sebum with a 1-minute cleansing routine while a targeted firming facial massage leaves skin smoother and younger-looking.

name: PMD Personal Microderm Pro
description: Personal Microderm Pro is a revolutionary at-home device providing the same brilliant results as professional microdermabrasion treatments.

name: Anti-Breakout Skincare Wand With Blue Light Therapy
description: The award-winning Solawave Skincare Wand uses science-backed technology to reduce the appearance of blemishes and dark circles.

name: Lucea 1” Professional Straightening & Styling Flat Iron
description: Delivers advanced heat precision for smooth, shiny styles in just one pass.

name: Trinity Complete Facial Toning Kit
description: The NuFACE Trinity Complete kit is a microcurrent facial toning kit that helps improve facial contour, tone, & the appearance of fine lines & wrinkles with three targeted attachments.

name: Bottle PureVis
description: The LARQ Bottle PureVis is the world's first self-cleaning water bottle and water purification system.

name: Luxe Skincare Fridge
description: Upgrade your beauty routine by increasing the shelf-life and efficacy of skincare products by keeping them chilled!
